scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run format
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run format && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy: $(date)" && git push
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npm run format && git add . && git commit -m "Production Deploy: $(date)" && git push origin main
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npm run format && git add . && git commit -m "Staging Deploy: $(date)" && git push origin develop
scripts.pre-commit: npm run type-check && npm run format:check
scripts.ci: npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
